entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `<GeneratePackageOnBuild>` causes `dotnet pack` to fail #24318
  • msbuild silently ignores workload pack import, if the expected version of the pack is not found #21032
    6.0.3xx
  • `dotnet new android` attempts to restore Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64 #19891
    6.0.3xx
  • [6.0.200-preview.22055.15] `dotnet tool run ...` will "hang" if the requested tool is not installed #23687
    6.0.3xx
  • `dotnet run` with invalid framework and `--` goes into infinite loop #23034
    6.0.3xx
  • Provide better experience when the dotnet version installed with VS and the available .NET MAUI version don't match #23295
  • Solved by install this update from WU catalog: #23314

Updated

  • Add --configfile switch to dotnet list package #24004
    Backlog
  • Workloads should be able to control the relative import order of .props and .targets #22358
    6.0.4xx
  • MSBuild AvailablePlatforms property should include arm64 #23994
  • Workloads: Detect and wait for active installs #19770
    7.0.1xx
  • Workloads: Ensure commands are atomic #19773
    7.0.1xx
  • Some tests fail on Linux (CI doesn't run all tests) #19783
    7.0.1xx
  • Concurrent workload commands uninstall each other #20094
    7.0.1xx
  • Repair causes fatal exception when you add the metadata file for MSI to a applocal file based installation #20096
    6.0.4xx
  • Localization of "description" field of manifest file #20497
    6.0.4xx
  • ⚡ Add --version and --version-prefix to dotnet build and dotnet pack, please #22840
  • When installing or updating workloads, better handle flaky network connectivity #20617
    6.0.4xx
  • NuGet.targets incorrectly performs a url-decode on filesystem paths, resulting in projects not found #20901
    6.0.4xx
  • Workload resolver should check for WorkloadManifest.json file instead of just looking for a directory #21676
    6.0.4xx
  • Specifying both -f ... and -r ... to dotnet build fails to restore if multiple frameworks are present in the project file #21877
    6.0.4xx
  • dotnet publish output option copy old packages to the publish folder #22220
    6.0.4xx
  • M1 Apple Monterey: Dotnet tool not found in zsh shell #22588
    6.0.4xx
  • Trying to get the packages for MAUI with MSVS 2022 preview did not download #23921
  • dotnet tool restore --interactive hangs forever #24220
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet tool install error installing when a private feed is in nuget.config #24140
    8.0.1xx
  • NETSDK1100 when building projects with multiple TargetFrameworks #23306
    Discussion
  • Need better logging for the native SDK resolver #15149
    7.0.1xx
  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716
  • Attempting to codesign a MacOS app corrupts the app #24337
  • Cannot run dotnet core WinForms app on .Net 6.0 #24503
  • Build for musl 1.1.24 #24448
  • dotnet tool restore interactive doesn't prompt for DeviceFlow since .NET 6 SDK #22987
  • Form designer keep loading when targeting to .NET 7.0 #24389

PullRequests

Created

  • Change LastIndexOf to use invariant culture #24518
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update param in CoreGenerateSatelliteAssemblies #24514
    Area-ILLink
  • Detect arm64 hostfxr.dll #24512
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24169
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change the missing workload message to recommend doing a restore. #24450
    Area-Workloads
  • Refactor some workload APIs #24488
    Area-Workloads
  • Error using skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24288
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1679097 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Hide manifest updates during workload install #24451
    Area-Workloads
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure
